flowRoot.flowPara: A good refactoring takes less than ten minutes. Aim to do a series of refactorings rather than fixing everything at once.
Refactoring without at least some test automation is difficult and risks breaking your code.
Improve the structure of software without changing its observable behavior.
Here are a few common small refactorings you might see frequently:
replace a loop by a comprehension
move a variable into a class
replace an if/elif block by a dictionary
